website_summaries.verdict: Offering a great compromise between focusing power, field of view, and portability, these binoculars are more than up to the task for most outdoor activities.
pros: Easy to focus thanks to ergonomic focus knob, with great clarity even in low-light conditions
Included harness and strap are comfortable to wear
Tripod mount is a nice addition
cons: Eye caps are not the best
No lens covers included (though they can be requested through the manufacturer)

customer_reviews.title: And the winner is...
customer_reviews.text: I bought several models of binocs to test side-by-side and in the end, my friends and I chose this Carson model over the Nikon Monarch 5s and 7s. All three are excellent and no one would be disappointed with any of them, but for us the Carsons had an extra brightness and clarity to them that gave them the edge over the Monarchs. And of course the price will keep you smiling. I thought the "BinoArmor Deluxe Carrying Case" was an irritation at first, but I've grown to like the design and found it handy in the field.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Value & Binoculars
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent binoculars. I've been looking at purchasing a set of good binos for a while now. After reading reviews and looking at prices I bought these. Very very happy. I took them into the local Field and Stream and Bass Pro and compared them to the Nikon Monarch 5 with ED glass and they are nicer. Brightness and clarity are both excellent but the Carson has a larger FOV. Not to mention that these come with a nice shoulder case, shoulder harness, and a neck strap as well. All included.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Originally I had decided to purchase a pair of Nikon Monarch binoculars. As with most purchases today you end up reading reviews on Amazon and other sites. Came across these Carson Binoculars and most reviews were very positive and the price was less expensive and the Carson's included a intergrated case with shoulder harness and neck strap. So, after using these the last month plus, I have to say the lens quality is excellent, great in low light, eye cups are easy to adjust and overall weight with case is very nice considering the package. I would recommend these to birders or any general use. Great value and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Atwood

customer_reviews.title: Great binoculars especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: This optic has exceeded my expectations! I have been using vortex diamondback 10x42s for a year or so but was looking for something smaller and easier to get behind. The Diamondback was very difficult to get a full sight picture without darkening at the edges. After seeing some good reviews on the Carson 3ded I decided to try them. I purchased the 8x32 version. All I can say is these are awesome! Easy to get behind, no blackening and razor sharp images, great light gathering.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: the ideal binocular
customer_reviews.text: i was looking for one of the best and ideal binos that i can afford.reading at all the reviews about nikon,celestron,bushnell etc.i ended up buying the carson because it's clear and bright looking through and not alot of "shake" looking through it.the focus is smooth when turning,has the feature for the stand,twist up eye cup,and comes with a nice shoulder harness and protective wrap.has feature for tripod,it's got nitrogen purge and a 3D ED glass.a wider field of view than nikon monarch 5.i'm so satisfied with my purchase.I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and product
customer_reviews.text: My wife has a pair of Nikon binoculars that I bought her 30 years ago that we have used as the gold standard for comparisons. These binoculars are the only ones that can stand up against her Nikons. I cant tell the difference looking through them and they are so much lighter than the Nikons. Coupled with the water resistance and the fantastic warranty, these binoculars and a fantastic value.
customer_reviews.author: revelstone77

customer_reviews.title: Dollar for dollar I don't think they can be beat for what you get!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 10x42's for birding although most people say go with 7X or 8X. Since these aren't in local stores I purchased on Amazon and decided to pit them against others in Cabela's. I would have to say based on what I found focusing on various things in the store, these were better than Vortex Diamonback and Nikon Monarchs. The FOV is misleading because my 10X's were giving me more than most of the lower power binoculars. I also found close focus is much less than the MFG gives and measured it about 6'. I love everything they come with including the case/holder the way it's engineered. It's my opinion they really really shine in low light conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Adkins

customer_reviews.title: A great view for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: These are great, really clear and sharp, no aberrations. the design of the case is thoughtful, easy to whip them out and then it all folds back up with almost no need to manually put each lens cap back on. only issue I have is I wish you could stow it with the eye piece shades extended. the distance between eyes can go really narrow, which is great for use with my kids. I am really glad I went with these over the prostaff 7s, which were also a great set for the price, but the carson had a smaller feel and better close focus distance.
customer_reviews.author: A. G. Lightner

customer_reviews.title: Chromatic aberration and loss of sharpness in upper and lower FOV.
customer_reviews.text: Carson 3D 10x42: Very smooth focus without lash in both focus controls, nice to hold, but poor performing glass. Comes in a fancy gift box with a soft case with internal elastic restraint strap to make up for the unique, but weak, magnetic flap closure. The glass itself compares to much cheaper competition.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic optics all around
customer_reviews.text: I like to use these 10 by 42 binoculars for all of my outdoor activities. Whether I'm at the beach overlooking Lakes or out kayaking. Having 10 power is awesome. I have always enjoyed looking at everything mother nature has put in front of me. From boats to wildlife the optics of these binoculars is outstanding​. Just dial for an instant focus. Everything is so easy to use. The feel of the camo rhino armor shell makes these feel great on your hands. I went from an old pair of vivitar binoculars that we're only 7 power. WOW what a difference it's made. So if your looking for a great upgrade for a great price look no further.
customer_reviews.author: tommy

customer_reviews.title: Compact, well constructed and awesome vision
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal! We purchased this for a trip down to the Galapagos Islands and it did the job - PERFECTLY. I am not a binoculars aficionado, but this product is compact, yet awesome capability to see with extreme clarity the smallest of features or creatures a great distance away. If you do not wear glasses the two eye pieces telescope out with a 1/4-turn and are extremely comfortable against the face/eye area. When they got dusty/dirty we just washed them off in the sink and all was well!
customer_reviews.author: PFM

customer_reviews.title: Great viewing quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for vacation to Utah. Great quality for spectacular Utah terrain and amazing stargazing! Highly recommend for the novice to experienced. They are not the lightest set I ever owned, but hey, quality optics weight a little more!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly hawke

customer_reviews.title: Great binoculars for this price point!
customer_reviews.text: As an amateur birder & binocular-user, I found these to be a great match. Very sharp, clear details... especially impressive under low light conditions. They are easy to focus and come w/ both a comfortable neck strap and a shoulder rig. My only negative would be the lack of lens covers; using the soft case in a fold-out position for viewing (as designed) felt awkward and cumbersome. Since I don't anticipate rough conditions while birding, I feel that these will serve my purpose very well. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Taz B

customer_reviews.title: Great Value on ED binoculars
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new pair for general purpose use to replace my Nikon's that disappeared. I read lot's of reviews and tried out lot's of brands and choose these and am happy. Several people at work brought their newer binoculars in and compared, and these excelled, especially the image sharpeness around the edges and brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Britt Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding clarity
customer_reviews.text: I have just returned from an African Safari. Without these binoculars I would have missed a lot of the action. The magnification was just right, the brightness and clarity of the birds and animals was perfect. Night vision was so much better that similar 10 X 42 binoculars made by other companies that my friends were using. The strap provided for comfortable carrying was excellent. I could go on, all the people on the safari are switching to Carson 10 X 42s now.
customer_reviews.author: Peter H

customer_reviews.title: Crisp and clear
customer_reviews.text: We took it to Panama to watch birds and other wildlife. The binoculars are easy to focus and deliver a crisp and clear image (3D effect). I've tried a few in the $100 range and was not happy. I do not have a comparison in the $300 range but I'm absolutely happy with what I bought. There is one complaint though: the bag for the binoculars is USELESS. It folds around the binoculars and is supposed to close through magnets. The magnets don't hold, rendering the whole bag an open nuisance.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: A great and reasonably priced product.
customer_reviews.text: I am new to "good" binoculars and have only used older Nikons. The light gathering capability of the Carson ED ( for the extra cost it is well worth it. I ordered the non ED lenses first and realized there was another choice so I ordered again and compared them side by side. No question. I returned the first pair and ordered a second ED set for my wife. The Carson is easy to focus and we enjoyed observing a red shouldered hawk hunting a salt marsh over a range of about 100 to 300 yards for over 10 minutes. Oh and the lifetime warranty is impressive also. At this price Carson has me convinced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set of binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set of binoculars. Great quality and extras. Didn't really get me to the level I presumed they would in terms of general astronomy, that is at least being able to see Jupiter larger than a tiny disc shape, or the rings of Saturn, even faintly, but that's my fault, the binos are great. Good build quality, smooth focusing. Only wish they had come lens caps so I could leave them out of the case when not in use. I will eventually get around to buying the caps once I do some research to find a 3rd party manufacturer who makes both front and back that fit snugly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Carson 3D 10x50 ED Binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Carson 3D 10x50 are a great pair of optics and the price and warranty make it a smart purchase you won't regret. You'll wonder why you never heard of Carson. With the additional extras I got with my purchase, the lens caps, the magnetic cover, the chest shoulder straps and the nice padded neck strap you have different ways of taking them along with you. Next week they are going on my boat to an Island named Afognak, I'm hoping & praying to harvest a Roosevelt Elk.
customer_reviews.author: Will The Thrill

customer_reviews.title: Worth a serious look!!
customer_reviews.text: After using these binoculars for over a week now watching whales from shore on Kauai I can only rate these 5 stars. I am so glad that I let the previous reviews guide my purchase. The clarity and color are spectacular. I have even carried them into the pool as they are waterproof so I can watch the whales jump from an infinity pool. I really like the case and multiple straps. The shoulder harness is a great idea that keeps the binoculars close to your chest at the ready but still the case which flips open effortlessly due to the magnets that are built in.
customer_reviews.author: LawrenceJ

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these binoculars.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these binoculars! We purchased these originally a couple of years ago and used them on an Alaskan cruise. Then we've used them from the upper balcony for operas, shows, in the backyard for birds and on nature trips. Nothing could be more clear. Nothing could be more bright. The case is made with magnets to flip open easily when you want to use them when you wear the case around your neck. The case is great, the 3D is unbelievable. The binoculars were stolen out of our luggage on a flight, and we loved them so much that I bought another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: makes you feel like a visual 'sniper'
customer_reviews.text: I just received them this morning and was looking into the yards on either side of me.......and focused in on a flower....well, there was a spider there as well that I could not see at all without the Carsons but with them, I watched the spider wrap it's prey up in silk for tonight's supper....WOW !!!!! Full color-it was black and yellow and as plain as if it was in my hand but was probably 60 feet away. I can't wait for the mountains and looking for wildlife......up close and personal......makes you feel like a visual 'sniper'.
customer_reviews.author: value finder

customer_reviews.title: Other than that great binoculars.
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint I have is if you wear the chest harness the clips on the harness ( not the neck strap clips) are hard to compress between thumb and forefinger to release it from the harness if you want to say remove and share your binoculars with a friend. First time I tried to take the binoculars off the shoulder harness I needed to use a pair of needlenose pliers. Of course you can just use the neck strap instead, Other than that great binoculars.
customer_reviews.author: Trailblazer2

customer_reviews.title: They're awesome binoculars at a great price
customer_reviews.text: They come with lens covers, that seem to be the biggest complaint. They're awesome binoculars at a great price! I have work with Zeiss, Wild, Nikon, and Leica survey instruments in the past and feel that what I observe through these binoculars is high quality and clear to the eye. I plan on watching Marine Wildlife off my balcony, cheers and enjoy, Cy Cole
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did a ton of research, couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for superior binoculars regardless of price look no further! Come with case, strap, harness and awarranty that cannot be beat!! I went with the 8x42 and will prob grab a 10x42 next
customer_reviews.author: @woodovenboston

customer_reviews.title: Great clarity.
customer_reviews.text: I'm no binocular expert and I'm sure there may be better glass out there but these have accomplished everything I wanted and are as good or better than some HD glass I have looked through at twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: foster4mom

customer_reviews.title: No strain, lots of gain!
customer_reviews.text: Just got them today, oooh la la, just loving the clarity and definition. So much better than what I have had in the past which were a pair of old Nikons. A little bit heavier and bigger than I expected, but solid build, comfortable and feel good in the hands with the thumb supports. I'm not sure about the case they came in and will get back later in this review when I've had them in the field longer. I'm happy already though and glad about the purchase and like the fact that they are reasonably priced compared to a lot of other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Poe

customer_reviews.title: FIrst time high quality binocular purchase
customer_reviews.text: We have never had high quality binoculars and my wife, who mostly loves to watch birds and look at trees and flowers, really wanted some nice binoculars for Christmas. After doing some research as a binocular newbie, I read about ED glass, optics, and the right zoom level and field of view for what my wife wanted. She absolutely loves these binoculars - easy to use and crystal clear. Just amazing to folks who are new to high quality binoculars. Since we hike a lot, the additional harness and the soft wrap with magnetic closure makes these easy to take on any hike, while protecting the lenses at the same time. We are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: nc3man

customer_reviews.title: Great Binoculars
customer_reviews.text: These are actually 3D! When looking through regular binoculars everything is flat, you get no depth perception at all. This set gives you the depth perception. They are easy to adjust and the lenses are very clear. I bought these for my husband and he uses them in his job as a police officer. I would recommend these for anyone that wants a clearer picture of what they are looking at from a distance.
customer_reviews.author: L. C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Everything you could hope for...and more!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bins! Excellent clarity, low light performance, close focus, and extras (harness etc.). They DO come with objective and eyepiece covers, but the containment system works great without them. I did a ton of research and I've had a chance to compare against vortex...I'm really pleased with this purchase, I can't wait for hunting season to start!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazed
customer_reviews.text: Amazed by these binos. Reviews came back consistently positive across multiple sites. No fault lifetime warranty combined with crystal clear image puts these on par with models that cost a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Bright Image ! Great Warranty!
customer_reviews.text: Great Image..Crystal Clear..Good ergonomics...Nice case and straps...Very Happy with This purchase After I did a Lot of hands on comparisons.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bell

customer_reviews.title: My research was worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at the Nikon Monarch and read a comparison with a few brands including the Carson. I bought the Carson to take to Alaska. They compare very favorably, if not better, than my friends Steiner. The optics are clear and they are lightweight and easy to use. The case is slightly different but not bad. I read other reviews about the lens covers, or lack thereof. I made one call and Carson sent me a set of covers that can attach to the binoculars.
customer_reviews.author: WtrBby

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Well Made Binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and laid out binoculars. Extremely comfortable in your hands The optics are superior to any other binoculars I have owned, which are many. These are especially useful in low light situations but are remarkably clear in full sunlight also. I look forward to many years of use while all my others will probably remain in the closet
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: High quality Bino's at a great price
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars are great. I used several Bushnell and Leupold bino's before but these are certainly the best. I debated between these and Nikon's Monarch 5 and several reviews online have the Carson's out on top. This is my first Carson product and I am impressed with the solid feel of them. The adjustment wheel is smooth and has no play. I received these towards dusk and could instantly see how much light is transmitted at low light conditions. These will be an excellent upgrade in my hunting pack.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Geisler

customer_reviews.title: best bang for the buck given the high quality attributes
customer_reviews.text: was extremely satisfied with this choice for binoculars, as the optics are exceptional, they are light, was happy with the field of view, are very user friendly and first bird viewed through them was a beautiful Magnolia Warbler. At first i was a little disappointed that there were no lens covers, but after reading booklet and installing straps and ingenious use of the case for protection, feel it will be adequate.I do wish the case accomodated the binoculars better with the the eyepieces extended.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L. Sowl

customer_reviews.title: Best binoculars you can buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars are AMAZING! I have had Carson binoculars before so I knew about their unconditional warranty and great quality. I was skeptical about the "3D" part of these, but it really works and makes birds and other things POP when you view them! They cost a little more than other brands, but they are WELL worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Buzzojoe

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Binnocular, that are High Definition
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Binnocular, that are High Definition. I have enjoyed them. Thank you so much, because I have been looking for Binoculars for some time off and on. That is if it crossed my mind. So when I saw these Binoculars, I was well pleasedf.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Bernadette E. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good binoculars. Easy to to focus, not very heavy. I bought it in 2016 as a present for my husband, who loves it. We use it for bird and coyote watching! I would definitely buy it again if it got lost.
customer_reviews.author: Ziegenbock

customer_reviews.title: No lower end adjustment for narrower pupils
customer_reviews.text: The image is clear and bright. The case provides good protection and is easy to use. Not much “interpupillary distance” adjustment at the low end. My pupil distance is about 62mm. I have to have the binoculars closed all the way in order to get a clear, single image.
customer_reviews.author: LizardLane

customer_reviews.title: Best Binoculars I've Ever Invested in
customer_reviews.text: Decide to go all out, and get the best...Carson. You get what you pay for Never gets old when it comes to excellent craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Deadlyous

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY PLEASED
customer_reviews.text: Clarity is exceptional. The ED really helps in reducing color fringing (Chromatic Aberration) Well made, comfortable and bright.
customer_reviews.author: FRANK MC GOWAN

customer_reviews.title: Great Binoculars
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars serve their purpose well. I chose these over the Bushnell Legend Ultra HD and Nikon Monarch 5 because they are a little lighter in weight, come with an awesome protective cover and included shoulder straps. The lens covers are available upon request from Carson. I use them with a tripod or a shooting stick while glassing during the hunting season and they allow you to see vivid details hundreds of yards out.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Crisp, clear images and great quality feel
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a present for my father. He can't stop talking about them! Crisp, clear and quick to adjust. The quiet-open storage allows you to grab them without disturbing the wildlife. His friends all want them now, so I guess that says something!
customer_reviews.author: Alan B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent binoculars!
customer_reviews.text: I have been researching and testing binoculars for more than a year, looking for just the right pair. I found them! These binoculars are excellent! Very nice quality, and a great deal too. I will be using mine for sporting events, shooting, nature watching, and general use. And the warranty is phenomenal. I pride myself on finding great buys for quality items, and this may be one of my best!
customer_reviews.author: Scott T Franz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality , Perfect Size, Football and Hikes.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Quality Optics, I have a pair of the J-Series and LOVE THEM for Football games and bird/wildlife/hiking. They are an excellent size and weight for football outdoor pursuits. I have had 4 people go out and buy Carson from 49ers games alone after viewing some of the game through mine. Just get'em!
customer_reviews.author: Adrien L

customer_reviews.title: Used them for birding for three seasons now
customer_reviews.text: I love them. Crisp image. Easy to carry. I love the fact they don't fog up in cold weather. Very cool. Perfect for any outdoorsman, birder, or hiker.
customer_reviews.author: Herb

customer_reviews.title: Love these binoculars enough to buy a second pair for ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Love these binoculars enough to buy a second pair for my grandson. He is 15 years old, loves to hike and has been picked to participate as a camp counselor this summer. The clarity is amazing while watching humming birds and butterflies pollinate flowers.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great optics
customer_reviews.text: Perfect as a starter set for people who are getting started with binoculars (and don't know whether it's worth it to venture outside of this price range). The Carson 3D performs comparably to the Nikon Monarchs (give or take on a few metrics) and comes at a better price point. Are there less expensive entry level options? You bet, but this is definitely one of the best values.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Superb for Star Gazing
customer_reviews.text: Superb Binoculars. I use these for Astronomy. The images are clear and sharp. for 10X50 they don't weigh too much so they are easy enough to hold. I prefer these to the 8X42 for Astronomy. Focusing is precise and smooth. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Man

customer_reviews.title: Did a lot of research, and these are everything I expected. Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the case was a bit higher quality. As for the Binos, look no further best value to hi-quality you can find. I returned my vortex dimondbacks and kept these, no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Reseaerch paid off
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for the best pair of 8x40 binos on the market for the money and spent a couple of weeks trying out binos at the store and researching on line...these hidden gems came out on top, easily. I'm very satisfied with their low light performance and clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: This is better than my Leopold's it replaced. Image is crystal clear.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S

customer_reviews.title: Great set of optics
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I use these for bird watching, and have really enjoyed getting up close without getting up close! The optics are really clear, have a wide field of view (lift up binoculars to eye and find what you want quickly!) We just used them for a trip abroad and the light weight and superior optics made wildlife watching a real joy.
customer_reviews.author: M Grundmann

customer_reviews.title: I've never owned a good pair of binoculars before so I have nothing to ...
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned a good pair of binoculars before so I have nothing to compare these to. All I can say is they are everything I needed. They are waterproof, fog-proof, and the vision is clear and bright. When I bird watch now, it is like being a couple of feet away from the birds. Loving it.
customer_reviews.author: jus42da

customer_reviews.title: Super Value
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value, I could not be happier with them. I looked at the vortex viper HDs and I would say that these are in the same league but at a lower price point. Eye caps suck, but the glass is better than expected, I am super happy.
customer_reviews.author: SGT STINKY

customer_reviews.title: Great Binocs for hunting
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a hunting trip to Wyoming mule deer hunting. Worked just as expected. Never fogged up even with change of temperatures. Used them with sunglasses on all day and never affected my view. Glassed hundreds of acres and with the chest support my neck never was tired. I would recommend these to anyone looking for a good quality binoculars.
customer_reviews.author: Goods

customer_reviews.title: and I have to say that these Carson's are amazing. Crystal clear
customer_reviews.text: I own Zeiss and Stiener binocs, and I have to say that these Carson's are amazing. Crystal clear, correct columniation, exceptionally bright images. Nothing in the price range, especially for 10 x 50s, can compare.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Excellant for Hunters!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is an avid hunter and wanted a new pair of binoculars. He asked me to order some for him since he knows how well I research products, read all the reviews and look for the best prices. I selected these binoculars after doing a lot of research and price comparison. Well, these were a BIG hit! He stated that he likes them better than a $700.00 dollar pair he has used that don't fit well against his eyes. He also said that the magnification and clarity of these binoculars is excellant. You can't go wrong with these binoculars and the price was less than $200.00 dollars. Great quality and low price. That's a win/win in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Carson is an excellent pair of binoculars for someone who has better eye ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually never write a review. I decided to keep the Vortex Razor despite the cost. The Carson is an excellent pair of binoculars for someone who has better eye sight. The construction and weight of the Carson is outstanding, and of course the price is right. My decision was based on age and overall quality along with the fact that a few bucks more at this stage of my life was not going to make or break me.
customer_reviews.author: S. Verni

customer_reviews.title: Great optics. First class.
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME!! I bought these for my son, who lives in Colorado. He hunts in open range areas and in wooded areas. He is thrilled with these binoculars. Super clear field of vision and light weight. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: tinyhousebuilder

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: Product came in a timely fashion. The optics and ED lenses give a bright, sharp picture. Heft is fine and thumb grooves are nice. I was disappointed that the instruction booklet said nothing about the particular model. It aslo failed to describe how to use the enclosed harness and neck strap. It does n't seem to have any quick connectors for either strap. There were also no lens covers.
customer_reviews.author: Monrodeo

customer_reviews.title: Sniper quality.
customer_reviews.text: Solid and well made with superb optics. For the price point they simply cant be beat by any other manufacturer. I was so impressed with these I am planning on buying more models in their range.
customer_reviews.author: Barney

customer_reviews.title: Sharp, clear image.
customer_reviews.text: Best binoculars I've ever owned. I have trifocals and these work great with or without my glasses-plenty of eye relief.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: 3D 10X50 Great binoculars I am very impressed
customer_reviews.text: 3D 10X50 Great binoculars I am very impressed! You cant beat this deal. I was looking at the vortex HD10X50 but the price kept beating me down. You will not regret buying the Carson HD ED Glass. From the packaging to the accessories that come with it, you can tell they are proud to put their name on it...... and they should be!
customer_reviews.author: Dru Boren

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 10x52 mm one before Christmas 2014 at $269.99. Very high quality, love it!!! Once received it, called the company in New York and asked for a pair of lens cap. They did sent to me for FREE!!! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So here's the deal - we were perfectly happy with the old binoculars we had
customer_reviews.text: So here's the deal - we were perfectly happy with the old binoculars we had. Our grandson dropped them, so I went online to purchase a new set right away; we use our binoculars everyday, so we didn't want to spend a lot of time shopping around and chose these based on the excellent (and well deserved reviews on Amazon). THESE ARE AWESOME! We hadn't realized far the technology in binoculars had come! These are leaps and bounds better than our old binoculars, with absolutely amazing clarity. We can't recommend them highly enough. Excellent choice!
customer_reviews.author: V. Quinlan

customer_reviews.title: These binos are amazing. I can see things that were fuzzy with ...
customer_reviews.text: These binos are amazing. I can see things that were fuzzy with my old ones. Love all the features. The packaging was superb, I felt like I was opening a precious luxury item, which actually, I was! I am going to love these in the field. The way the case unfolds but stays on is unbelievable and will help keep these in mint condition....no husband, these are not yours to borrow....get your own.
customer_reviews.author: Buzybette

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the
customer_reviews.text: For birding fiends who don't know what they're doing and have to catch a bird in sight quickly. We have three pairs and now don't fight. Great product for the money
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Hagerty

customer_reviews.title: Balanced in price + quality + expectation.
customer_reviews.text: The quality, the function, and the price are just right. I appreciate when all the study on the product in comparison with all the other factors come together ... it is nice to get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a Christmas gift and he was pleased as well as surprised. He has since used them and he tells me they are great!
customer_reviews.author: TerriP

customer_reviews.title: They surpass my old 8x40 Brutons which are very good. Completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have a 30 mile view off my deck and my new 10x50 Carson 3D binoc's bring even the farthest islands and mts into clear view. They surpass my old 8x40 Brutons which are very good. Completely satisfied. Only complaint, no lense covers. I like to have them sitting out ready to go and without lense covers, dust is a problem. With lense covers I would have given them 5 *.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Smith

customer_reviews.title: carson 10x50 3d series
customer_reviews.text: Very good glasses. One note on the case it has a warning about pace makers with that being said it the case will also will ruin a old fashioned compass.
customer_reviews.author: Dean E. Umberger

customer_reviews.title: The clarity is unmatched and so is the ruggedness.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, quality product. It is well built, and the glass is great. They’re easy to focus, and extremely clear and detailed. The accessories are great quality as well, but they were worth the amount without them. I was easily able to focus on small building a mile away across a country section with a ton of obstacles.
customer_reviews.author: GBott

customer_reviews.title: No Regret
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I took these binoculars on an Alaskan cruise this summer and used them frequently. They are everything I hoped they would be.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Carson 3D
customer_reviews.text: Huge value for the money. Feature rich and nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Horst

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to take to football games and have only used them once. For that use they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent!!! Works perfect for our needs. Able to view far away and clear. Easy to hold and the right size. We love and great quality, would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: karen m.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Binoculars
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars work great and making viewing a pleasure. I love how they feel in my hands and that they come with a harness. I did have to order individual lens cap covers (no charge) from Carson in NY. Customer service was a pleasure to work with. One minor complaint they should ship the binoculars with the lens caps already included as part of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Bliss

customer_reviews.title: Quality Glass for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: After using them on two trips now, my wife and I love them! For the price, we have never had better Binoculars. Very clear picture and they feel good in the hand. The included chest harness was a nice bonus that we were not expecting as well!
customer_reviews.author: AKFLHXS

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, Amazon was great
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase, Amazon was great! Received product in great shape and very quickly. The binoculars are just what I had hoped for and the viewing image is great, crystal clear and very bright. Can't wait to spend more time with these in the field. Very happy with this purchase, thanks Carson for a great product and thanks amazon for making the purchase a good experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Great Binoculars at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I own several pair of binoculars but found a need to upgrade in order to observe bald eagles nesting in my "back yard". After researching several bird watching web sites I found that the Carson 3D series were highly rated in a price range I can afford. After receiving these binoculars in a very prompt fashion, they are far better than I anticipated and will be ordering another pair in the near future. Highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Keith D. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Great for hunting or birding
customer_reviews.text: So clear and bright. Great for hunting or birding. Case is great concept for carrying and protecting from rain, yet available for viewing in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Sportsman

customer_reviews.title: A excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I did not even know this brand until I did some research in order to buy binoculars for hunting. Reviews always came up at or close to the top of their price range even when pitted against Nikon and Leupold. Mind you this is not a Swarovski or a Leica. However in the $250 to $400 range, it is an excellent product. One review stated that the price must have been artificially kept low vis-a-vis what you are getting in order to promote the name (again I had no idea who Carson was). I admit that they are incredibly clear. They are very rugged and very light . I would highly recommend them for hunting, nature viewing, bird watching, etc.
customer_reviews.author: MrA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent binoculars. Easy to use and are super clear
customer_reviews.text: Excellent binoculars. Easy to use and are super clear .
customer_reviews.author: Michael Schmitzerle

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Best compact binoculars I have ever seen or used for birding, hiking, very light, bright and clear.
customer_reviews.author: TES

customer_reviews.title: I am completely satisfied with the quality and performance of these binoculars
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a birthday gift and they are out of this world! I own Zeiss binoculars and now I hope to own Carson's in the future! I am completely satisfied with the quality and performance of these binoculars! I have purchased an affordable binocular which has fully met my expectations. Carson 3D Series High Definition Binouculars they are exceptional!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just do it
customer_reviews.text: Wow these are as good as any $300+ glasses sold by anyone. Razor sharp. Lots of little feature. Will be the last pair I ever buy.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Gaugler

customer_reviews.title: Carson 3D 10x42 ED Binoculars
customer_reviews.text: My wife got a pair of 8x42 Carsons and I was so impressed I bought myself the 10x42 version. These binoculars are sharp, clear, reasonably light, great price, and are just perfect for this eyeglass person. Love 'em.
customer_reviews.author: Dan G.

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: The optics are very good, equal I think to much more expensive brands. They are also very comfortable to hold and to use. My husband had a little trouble setting them to a wide enough width to fit his eyes, but after a few adjustments we managed to get them to work. Initially they seem to be a very good bargain at the price.
customer_reviews.author: dawn m roman

customer_reviews.title: Great Products
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic optics. Great set of Binoculars. Lightweight and small, but large enough to be easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Byron D. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Binoculars!
customer_reviews.text: I love them. Great grip feel, the included case and strap are nice touch that I will use in some situations. I like the collapsable eye cups. Firm focus ring and diopter. I called the company and told them I would like to get some lens covers. They said no problem, took my name and model of binoculars, and will be sending them out. Looking forward to my Colorado and Alaska trips!
customer_reviews.author: Susan S. Hosler

customer_reviews.title: Carson TD842 ED
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several pair of different other brand binoculars but nothing I have ever owned have compared to my Carson TD842 ED binoculars clarity and ease of use. The ballastic case is awesome, would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thought they were excellent and a good price for this much quality.
customer_reviews.author: Duffer Don

customer_reviews.title: Anne
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband as a gift mostly for watching our bluebirds. I am enjoying them too! Easy to hold and use with eye glasses. Adjusting was much easier than our old bins-no more squinting! Also purchased the attachment for taking iPhone pictures! Quality packaging to keep when not using! The video online is what helped pick Carson!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Cashdollar

customer_reviews.title: High quality, user friendly binoculars
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I don't know how you can beat this pair. Very powerful, crystal clear and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: J. Long

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These well made Binoculars are sharp at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Bates

customer_reviews.title: Excellent binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Without a question the best binoculars I've ever owned. Excellent brightness and razor sharp focus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The clarity is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my hubs. He says “ more stars than 5”! He LOVES them. The clarity is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: The best I have ever owned!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had mine for two years and they are the lightest, most compact and clearest lenses I have ever owned. You won't be disappointed. I use mine for deer hunting!
customer_reviews.author: LSULAW

product_meta.title: Carson 3D Series High Definition Waterproof Binoculars with ED Glass
product_meta.description:
Carson 3D Series High Definition Waterproof Binoculars with ED Glass
The full sized 3D Binoculars combine our HD optical coating technology with ED glass to give you the brightest, and clearest image possible.

Tough Construction
The 3D Series Binoculars with ED Glass is ideal for use as Hunting Binoculars or Birding Binoculars. Rubberized armor coating makes this Full-Sized 3D Binocular rugged and shock proof. The body is nitrogen purged and O-ring sealed making them waterproof and fog-proof.

Ready for the Great Outdoors
The precisely placed thumb grooves, "just right" texturing and all-over lightweight body ergonomics make the 3D Series Binoculars perfect for long hunts or bird watching expeditions. The 3D Series is also perfect outdoor activities or sporting events.

Usable with Eyeglasses
Extra- long eye relief with twist down eyecups make this Full-Sized 3D ED Glass Binocular perfect for eyeglass wearers.

America's Best Binocular Warranty
At Carson, we manufacture only the highest quality binoculars. We're so confident in our products that we back them with America's Best Binocular Warranty. In the event that your binoculars get damaged, regardless of cause, Carson will repair or replace them at NO CHARGE. If your binoculars are found to have manufacturing defects in materials or workmanship, Carson will repair or replace your binoculars and return them FREE OF CHARGE.

Box Contains
3D Series HD Waterproof Binoculars with ED Glass
BinoArmor Deluxe Carry Case
Neck Strap
Shoulder Harness
Lens Cloth
Lens Covers 



The case for this device contains magnets which can interfere with pacemakers and implantable cardioverter defibrillators (ICD’s). Individuals with pacemakers or ICD’s should NOT use this product.
feature_bullets: ED Glass for Sharper and Brighter Images | Magnification: 10x Power | Objective Lens Diameter: 42mm
Included Accessories: BinoArmor Deluxe Carry Case, Neck Strap, Shoulder Harness, Lens Covers and Lens Cloth
Includes Rubberized Armor Textured Coating| Color: Mossy Oak Camouflage | Waterproof and Fog proof | Fully Multi Coated Lenses
Field of View: 314 feet at 1,000 yards | Eye Relief: 16mm | BAK-4 Prisms | Weight: 1.4 lbs.
Perfect Camo Binoculars for Hunting, Bird Watching, Camping, Hiking, Backpacking, Traveling, Concerts, Sporting Events and other Outdoor Adventures | Backed by America's Best Binocular Warranty
